entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -39.2°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
